## News Review for edgeverve

# EdgeVerve News Review

## Executive Summary

EdgeVerve has positioned itself as a thought leader in AI governance while integrating its AI Next platform into Infosys' new AI-First Global Capability Center (GCC) Model launched November 17, 2025. The company's Chief Technology Officer Arvind Rao authored a comprehensive piece on AI data governance, emphasizing that "ambition has outrun discipline" in enterprise AI adoption and positioning data governance as the "operating system of trust" ([TechRadar](https://www.techradar.com/pro/what-is-data-governance-and-why-is-it-crucial-for-successful-ai-projects)). Simultaneously, EdgeVerve AI Next has been integrated as the unified platform component within Infosys' broader AI transformation services, working alongside Infosys Agentic Foundry and Infosys Topaz to transform Global Capability Centers into AI-powered innovation hubs ([PR Newswire](https://www.prnewswire.co.uk/news-releases/infosys-unveils-ai-first-gcc-model-to-transform-global-capability-centers-into-innovation-hubs-302616954.html)). This dual approach combines thought leadership in AI governance with practical platform deployment, targeting the market gap where fewer than 10% of organizations have robust governance frameworks despite enterprise GenAI adoption climbing from 55% in 2023 to 75% in 2024.

## Key Developments

**Product Integration**: EdgeVerve AI Next has been integrated as the core unified platform component within Infosys' AI-First GCC Model, enabling enterprises to run applied and agentic AI at scale. The platform works in conjunction with Infosys Agentic Foundry for building production-grade AI agents and Infosys Topaz for AI-first services ([Verdict](https://www.verdict.co.uk/infosys-ai-global-capability-centre-model/)).

**Thought Leadership Initiative**: EdgeVerve's CTO Arvind Rao published a comprehensive analysis on AI data governance, positioning the company as an advocate for disciplined AI implementation and governance frameworks in enterprise environments ([TechRadar](https://www.techradar.com/pro/what-is-data-governance-and-why-is-it-crucial-for-successful-ai-projects)).

**Market Positioning**: The company has positioned itself to address the governance gap in enterprise AI deployments, targeting organizations moving from AI pilots to production-scale implementations across banking and aviation sectors ([Hindu Business Line](https://www.thehindubusinessline.com/news/infosys-launches-ai-first-gcc-model-to-transform-gccs-into-innovation-hubs/article70290953.ece)).

## Market Context

EdgeVerve's developments align with the broader enterprise AI transformation trend, where GenAI adoption has grown from 55% to 75% year-over-year, with Gartner expecting 80% of organizations to run GenAI applications in production by 2026. The company's focus on governance addresses a critical market gap, as fewer than 10% of organizations currently have robust governance frameworks for tracking data lineage, bias, and model oversight. The integration into Infosys' GCC transformation services positions EdgeVerve within the growing market for AI-powered Global Capability Centers, leveraging Infosys' established practice spanning over 100 industry engagements.

## Notable Quotes

**Arvind Rao, Chief Technology Officer, Edge Platforms, EdgeVerve**: "Ambition has outrun discipline - and in the age of probabilistic systems, discipline is spelled G-O-V-E-R-N-A-N-C-E." ([TechRadar](https://www.techradar.com/pro/what-is-data-governance-and-why-is-it-crucial-for-successful-ai-projects))

**Arvind Rao, Chief Technology Officer, Edge Platforms, EdgeVerve**: "Treat data governance as the operating system of trust and AI becomes repeatable value at scale; neglect it and speed turns into risk at scale." ([TechRadar](https://www.techradar.com/pro/what-is-data-governance-and-why-is-it-crucial-for-successful-ai-projects))

**Arvind Rao, Chief Technology Officer, Edge Platforms, EdgeVerve**: "In the near future, intelligence will be table stakes - integrity will be the true differentiator." ([TechRadar](https://www.techradar.com/pro/what-is-data-governance-and-why-is-it-crucial-for-successful-ai-projects))

## Strategic Implications

EdgeVerve's dual strategy of thought leadership in AI governance combined with platform integration positions the company to capitalize on the enterprise AI maturation cycle. By emphasizing integrity over pure intelligence capabilities, EdgeVerve differentiates itself in a market where governance-focused AI solutions are becoming critical as enterprises move from experimental to production deployments. The integration with Infosys' GCC transformation services provides EdgeVerve with access to established enterprise relationships and implementation capabilities, potentially expanding its market reach beyond standalone platform sales to comprehensive AI transformation engagements. This approach positions EdgeVerve as both a technology provider and a strategic advisor in the enterprise AI governance space, addressing the fundamental challenge of scaling AI implementations while maintaining trust and compliance frameworks.

## Individual Articles

### Article 1: What is data governance and why is it crucial for successful AI projects?

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.techradar.com/pro/what-is-data-governance-and-why-is-it-crucial-for-successful-ai-projects)

## Summary

EdgeVerve's CTO Arvind Rao authored a thought leadership piece positioning the company as an advocate for disciplined AI data governance, arguing that while enterprise GenAI adoption has grown from 55% to 75% year-over-year, over half of enterprises lack proper data governance frameworks. Rao emphasizes that data governance should be treated as the 'operating system of trust' and warns that without proper discipline, AI speed becomes risk at scale. The article positions EdgeVerve's perspective that integrity, rather than intelligence, will become the key differentiator as AI moves from pilots to production, targeting the market gap where fewer than 10% of organizations currently have robust governance frameworks for tracking data lineage, bias, and model oversight.

## Executive Insights

**Arvind Rao, Chief Technology Officer, Edge Platforms, EdgeVerve**

> "Ambition has outrun discipline - and in the age of probabilistic systems, discipline is spelled G-O-V-E-R-N-A-N-C-E."

*Context: Discussing the gap between AI adoption enthusiasm and proper data governance implementation*

*Significance: Positions EdgeVerve as understanding the critical need for disciplined AI governance approaches*

**Arvind Rao, Chief Technology Officer, Edge Platforms, EdgeVerve**

> "Treat data governance as the operating system of trust and AI becomes repeatable value at scale; neglect it and speed turns into risk at scale."

*Context: Explaining the fundamental role of data governance in AI success*

*Significance: Establishes EdgeVerve's perspective on data governance as foundational infrastructure rather than optional add-on*

**Arvind Rao, Chief Technology Officer, Edge Platforms, EdgeVerve**

> "In the near future, intelligence will be table stakes - integrity will be the true differentiator."

*Context: Concluding remarks on the strategic importance of data governance*

*Significance: Frames EdgeVerve's market positioning around integrity and governance as competitive advantages*

### Article 2: Infosys presents AI-first global capability centre model

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.verdict.co.uk/infosys-ai-global-capability-centre-model/)

## Summary

Infosys has integrated EdgeVerve AI Next into its new AI-First GCC Model as a core platform for deploying enterprise-scale AI solutions. The integration positions EdgeVerve AI Next within a unified framework alongside Infosys Agentic Foundry and Infosys Topaz, targeting enterprises looking to transform their global capability centres into AI innovation hubs. This development places EdgeVerve AI Next in the enterprise AI deployment market as part of Infosys' comprehensive approach to AI transformation services, with implementations already underway across banking and aviation sectors.

### Article 5: Infosys Unveils AI-first GCC Model to Transform Global Capability Centers into Innovation Hubs

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.prnewswire.co.uk/news-releases/infosys-unveils-ai-first-gcc-model-to-transform-global-capability-centers-into-innovation-hubs-302616954.html)

The integration combines EdgeVerve with Infosys Agentic Foundry and Infosys Topaz to transform Global Capability Centers into AI-powered innovation hubs, targeting enterprises looking to establish or transform their GCCs. EdgeVerve AI Next serves as the platform foundation enabling production-grade agentic AI deployment across GCC operations, reinforcing its role in Infosys' broader enterprise AI strategy focused on large-scale implementations.
